alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 4:00AM HST until December 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI MAUI AND KAHOOLAWE... .A cold front near Kauai will move southeast down the island chain later today and tonight. Strong winds will develop behind the front and will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Kauai and Niihau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusts can make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
